name: ConradConnect
0:
”Alexa, tell Conrad Connect to start my living room recipe.”
”Alexa, open Conrad Connect.”
”Alexa, tell Conrad Connect to activate my living room recipe.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conrad connect
des:
At Conrad Connect you can integrate many different systems of smart home devices and combine them by making rules. We call these rules "recipes".
This skill enables Amazon Alexa to execute the recipes created at Conrad Connect. Therefore you only need a complete free account on "www.conradconnect.de" and create rules with the given list of names.
